Articles.Content:
Sector 7 Space Laboratories - Marine Division - RipTide

During my Oilfield project the barge I built was getting so much speed I thought about making a huge speed boat. Speeds are near 45m/s but can be
improved by reducing fuel onboard and swapping out the engines. The bow of the boat has enough room to land a VTOL craft, Transport large craft or large
structures. An undetermined amount of fuel could be added to travel a far distance if you find a use to do so. The Video is a very short clip because there is
really not many features to present. I think it looks cool and I may even build another version one day. Also I haven't toyed with it much like adding Vector
Engines, this could be an interesting result.

Note: There is an extra feature not shown for those who download it and give it a try.

 

"RipTide"

 

 

Operation: I was able to launch straight off the Runway into the water, keep the speed near 15 m/s or less when going of the end of the Runway. Action Groups are set to switch modes on the Panthers and also to help with the steering of the craft.

Craft File
RipTide

Edited June 3, 2016 by castille7
